problem_names: lemma left_space: "left (space ts v c) = pos ts c"
lemma right_space: "right (space ts v c) =   pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c"
lemma space_nonempty:"left (space ts v c ) < right (space ts v c)"
translations: lemma left_space: "left (space ts v c) = pos ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) = pos ts c
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) = pos ts c
have 1:"pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
using sensors_ge

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < sensors ?e ?ts ?c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
by (metis (no_types, hide_lams)  less_add_same_cancel1  )

proof (state)
this:
  pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) = pos ts c
show "left (space ts v c ) = pos ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) = pos ts c
using space_def Abs_real_int_inverse 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  space ?ts ?v ?c \<equiv>
  Abs_real_int (pos ?ts ?c, pos ?ts ?c + sensors (own ?v) ?ts ?c)
  ?y \<in> {r. fst r \<le> snd r} \<Longrightarrow>
  Rep_real_int (Abs_real_int ?y) = ?y
  pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) = pos ts c
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  left (space ts v c) = pos ts c

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma right_space: "right (space ts v c) =   pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. right (space ts v c) = pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. right (space ts v c) = pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
have 1:"pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
using sensors_ge

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < sensors ?e ?ts ?c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
by (metis (no_types, hide_lams)  less_add_same_cancel1  )

proof (state)
this:
  pos ts c < pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. right (space ts v c) = pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
show 3:"right(space ts v c ) = pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. right (space ts v c) = pos ts c + sensors (own v) ts c
using space_def Abs_real_int_inverse 1

proof (prove)
using this:
  space ?ts ?v ?c \<equiv>
  Abs_real_int (pos ?ts ?c, pos ?ts ?c + sensors (own ?v) ?ts ?c)
  ?y \<in> {r. fst r \<le> snd r} \<Longrightarrow>
  Rep_real_int (Abs_real_int ?y) = ?y

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

goal:

lemma space_nonempty:"left (space ts v c ) < right (space ts v c)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) < right (space ts v c)
using left_space right_space sensors_ge

proof (prove)
using this:
  left (space ?ts ?v ?c) = pos ?ts ?c
  right (space ?ts ?v ?c) = pos ?ts ?c + sensors (own ?v) ?ts ?c
  0 < sensors ?e ?ts ?c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. left (space ts v c) < right (space ts v c)
by simp
end
end
